#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string a,b;
    int n,i;
    cin>>n;
    while(n--)
    {
       cin>>a>>b;
       if(a.length()!=b.length())
        cout<<"NO\n";
       else
       {
           int ac[26]={0},bc[26]={0};
           for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
           {
               ac[a[i]-97]++;
               bc[b[i]-97]++;
           }
           for(i=0;i<26;i++)
           {
               if(ac[i]!=bc[i])
                break;
           }
           if(i==26)
            cout<<"YES\n";
           else
            cout<<"NO\n";
       }
    }
    return 0;
}
